user.query: MERGE (u:User { Id: <IDVAR> }) ON CREATE SET u.Deleted = false RETURN (u);
user.desc: Creates a user node with the user id stored

network.query: MERGE (n:Network { Id: <IDVAR> }) ON CREATE SET n.Deleted = false RETURN n;
network.desc: Creates a network node with the network id stored

tag.query: MERGE (t:Tag { Id: <IDVAR> }) ON CREATE SET t.Deleted = false RETURN t;
tag.desc: Creates a tag node with the tag id stored

post.query: MERGE (p:Post { Id: <IDVAR> }) ON CREATE SET p.Deleted = false RETURN p;
post.desc: Creates a post node with the post id stored

usersAsFriends.query: MATCH (u1:User),(u2:User) WHERE u1.Id = <IDVAR1> AND u2.Id = <IDVAR2> CREATE (u1)-[r:FRIENDS {SINCE: datetime()}]->(u2) RETURN u1,u2,r;
usersAsFriends.desc: Match two users based on their ids

userToNetwork.query: MATCH (u:User),(n:Network) WHERE u.Id = <IDVAR1> AND n.Id = <IDVAR2> CREATE (u)-[r:PART_OF]->(n) RETURN u,n,r;
userToNetwork.desc: Match user and network with their ids

userAsAdmin.query: MATCH (u:User),(n:Network) WHERE u.Id = <IDVAR1> AND n.Id = <IDVAR2> CREATE (u)-[r:ADMIN_OF]->(n) RETURN u,n,r;
userAsAdmin.desc: Make user a network admin with their ids

tagToUser.query: MATCH (t:Tag),(u:User) WHERE t.Id = <IDVAR1> AND u.Id = <IDVAR2> CREATE (t)-[r:INTERESTED_IN]->(u) RETURN t,u,r;
tagToUser.desc: Match tag to user with their ids

tagToNetwork.query: MATCH (t:Tag),(n:Network) WHERE t.Id = <IDVAR1> AND n.Id = <IDVAR2> CREATE (t)-[r:FOCUSED_ON]->(n) RETURN t,n,r;
tagToNetwork.desc: Match tag to network with their ids

tagToPost.query: MATCH (t:Tag),(p:Post) WHERE t.Id = <IDVAR1> AND p.Id = <IDVAR2> CREATE (t)-[r:RELATED_TO]->(p) RETURN t,p,r;
tagToPost.desc: Match tag to post with their ids

likeToPost.query: MATCH (u:User),(p:Post) WHERE u.Id = <IDVAR1> AND p.Id = <IDVAR2> CREATE (u)-[r:LIKES]->(p) RETURN u,p,r;
likeToPost.desc: Add user like to post with their ids

friendsList.desc: Get friends of user based on their id | TEST ALL THESE / ADD DELETED FILTER

usersInNetwork.desc: Get all users in network based on network id

networksUserIsIn.query: MATCH (u:User {Id: <IDVAR> })-[r]->(n) WHERE type(r) IN ['PART_OF', 'ADMIN_OF'] RETURN n;
networksUserIsIn.desc: Get all networks a user is in based on network id

networkAdmins.desc: Get all users in network based on network id

likedPosts.desc: Get users based on given tags | DEFINE SORTING

relatedUsers.desc: Get users based on given tags | DEFINE SORTING

relatedNetworks.desc: Get networks based on given tags | DEFINE SORTING

relatedPosts.desc: Get posts based on given tags | DEFINE SORTING

usersFromFriends.desc: Unmatch two users based on their ids

userFromNetwork.desc: Unmatch user and network with their ids (ADMIN????)

userFromAdmins.desc: Unmatch user a network admin with their ids

tagFromUser.desc: Unmatch tag from user with their ids

tagFromNetwork.desc: Unmatch tag from network with their ids

tagFromPost.desc: Unmatch tag from post with their ids

likeFromPost.desc: Remove user like to post with their ids

user.query: MATCH (u:User {Id: <IDVAR> }) SET u.Deleted = True RETURN u.Id, labels(u) AS labels
user.desc: Deletes user node with corresponding user id

network.query: MATCH (n:Network {Id: <IDVAR> }) SET n.Deleted = True RETURN n.Id, labels(n) AS labels
network.desc: Deletes network node with corresponding network id

tag.query: MATCH (t:Tag {Id: <IDVAR> }) SET t.Deleted = True RETURN t.Id, labels(t) AS labels
tag.desc: Deletes tag node with corresponding tag id

post.query: MATCH (p {Id: <IDVAR> }) SET p.Deleted = True RETURN p.Id, labels(p) AS labels
post.desc: Deletes post node with corresponding post id
